# SYNC TERMINAL

Displayed when no compatible flash unit is connected.

!Sync Terminal Menu

## Settings

| Setting              | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                 |
|----------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| â‘  Flash control mode | Choose from the following options:  - **M**: A trigger signal is transmitted via the hot shoe X contacts when a picture is taken. Choose a shutter speed slower than the sync speed; even slower speeds may be required if the unit uses long flashes or has a slow response time.  - **âšªOFF (OFF)**: The trigger signal is disabled. |
| â‘¡ Sync               | Choose whether the flash is timed to fire immediately after the shutter opens (**ðŸ“·FRONT / 1ST CURTAIN**) or immediately before it closes (**ðŸ“·REAR / 2ND CURTAIN**). **1ST CURTAIN** is recommended in most circumstances. |

### The Sync Terminal

Flash units requiring a sync cable connection cannot be used.
